title: Honoring Barbara Cutrone upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of the 2011 Spirit Award from the Huntington Foundation
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Barbara Cutrone upon the occasion of her
designation  as  recipient  of the 2011 Spirit Award from the Huntington
Foundation

WHEREAS, Individuals who give of their time and energies and  serve  the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS,  Barbara  Cutrone has given not only of her time and energies
but also of her competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently
has been designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative  Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor  Barbara
Cutrone  upon  the  occasion of her designation as recipient of the 2011
Spirit Award from the Huntington Foundation, to be celebrated on Friday,
January 21, 2011, in Woodbury, New York, at the 18th  Annual  Reach  for
the Stars fundraising gala; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Huntington  Foundation is a not-for-profit organization
dedicated to enhancing the quality  of  the  district's  schools;  since
parents  created  it in 1993, the Foundation has funded a large quantity
in educator-generated grants; and
  WHEREAS, The Huntington Foundation  for  Excellence  in  Education  is
honoring  Blue  Devil  Booster  Club  President Barbara Cutrone with the
group's Spirit Award; an extraordinary school volunteer, she has  served
as  a  PTA president and vice-president; her most impressive achievement
has come in helping to lead a renaissance for the  Blue  Devils  Booster
Club,  which  has  donated  a  significant  amount  in  goods to enhance
Huntington's athletic programs; and
  WHEREAS, Barbara Cutrone has been called upon to contribute  her  time
and  talents  to countless civic and charitable endeavors and has always
given of herself unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period  of  her  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive involvement, Barbara Cutrone has stood constant
in dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, With her throughout have been her husband, Frank, their chil-
dren, Sam, Jamie, and Jack, all of whom feel privileged to be a part  of
her life and rejoice in her achievements; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual  for  the  benefit  of  others  which  Barbara Cutrone has displayed
throughout her life; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Barbara Cutrone upon the occasion of her designation as recipient
of the 2011 Spirit Award from  the  Huntington  Foundation;  and  be  it
further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Barbara Cutrone.
